titleInfo.title: All for The Hall Los Angeles (2010)

mods.abstract: Three color window card (gold, green, and navy on white) announcing All For the Hall Los Angeles, a benefit for the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum's educational programs, with Vince Gill, Kris Kristofferson, Emmylou Harris, Taylor Swift and others at the Club Nokia on September 23.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
